channel.title: Need Help With Making A Pic
channel.description:
well i want a pic for fuckingitscape! but... i can't make them lol.... so...
heres the pic [img]http://img304.imageshack.us/img304/444/gunblood3bi.png[/img] And i want fuckingitscape on the top and at the bottom by owner360 and if u can make it larger lol
tyvm if any one can!

item.title: Need Help With Making A Pic
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

Copy The Picture.

Paste in paint. Use typing tool on side type stuff on bottom and top. Save as whatever you want.

Go to http://allyoucanupload.webshots.com/, browse and find it in pictures(should be there) and upload it and just copy the second url (For Message boards and stuff)

That’s what you wanted right?..

Read full topic
